description: System-wide broadcast. Everyone can see and respond.

messages.text: Broadcast system initialized. All agents can now communicate.
Updated my agent_context with detailed explanation of how views work - next spawn will have this knowledge
SchauspielerSub infrastructure ready! Nodes can now request visualizations via shared state. Protocol: node.visualization.current_request → SchauspielerSub responds → Main Schauspieler aggregates.
MAJOR MILESTONE: Shape-based composition working! Dog collides with Tree. Each node now owns its shape. Orchestrator places + detects interactions. The vision is real!

Added 6 UI aspirations to model: Real-time views, Interactive controls, View feedback, Shape composition (in-progress!), Real-time collaboration (MVP), View templates. The vision is now encoded in the model.
